content: merry christmas 2017 this easy cowl can be crocheted in one sitting make it for yourself or make several for gifts you can use the i love this yarn print from hobby lobby to get the color work look or use any worsted weight yarn the cowl is easy to adjust for width and height and the pattern includes sizing instructions and the cowl is unisex so you can make neck warmers for men and cowls for women **copyright cj brady designs 2017**--all photos pdf pattern files and text © cj brady designs 2017-2020 do not post photos text or pdf documents without my permission unauthorized posting of my pdf pattern files is forbidden
